overview:
Michael Farrington is a Salesforce rock star, one of a select group of people who have been chosen as both a Force.com MVP for his development prowess and as a Salesforce Community MVP for his thought leadership role in the Salesforce social media community.

Michael has been a Salesforce admin and Force.com developer for seven years, first at Symbol Technologies and then following it’s acquisition, at Motorola where Michael was the Sr. Force.com Mastermind in charge of Motorola’s global Salesforce strategy and implementation. Michael is widely regarded in the Salesforce ecosystem as one of the leading Salesforce business process experts. Michael’s knowledge of Apex, the language of the Salesforce platform is unparalleled, he is a much sought after speaker at virtually all of the Salesforce events.

When he’s not working, Michael serves as Co-Leader of the salesforce.com Las Vegas User Group. He also maintains a Salesforce focused website www.michaelforce.org. Outside the Salesforce realm, Michael studies Japanese, Brazilian Jiu Jitsu, and the art of true BBQ.
